text: Time 100 (often stylized as TIME 100) is an annual article that lists 100 of the most influential people in the world. It is published by the American news magazine Time. It was first published in 1999 as the result of a debate among American academics, politicians, and journalists, the list is now a highly publicized annual event. Only the winner of the Reader's Poll, conducted days before the official list is revealed, is chosen by the general public. == Categories of Time 100 == * Artist * Icons * Pioneers * Leaders * Titans * Innovators ==References== Category:People
title: Time 100
